title: Substance/Medication-Induced Depressive Disorder
description: A comprehensive guide to Substance/Medication-Induced Depressive Disorder, including diagnosis, management, and clinical considerations based on DSM-5 criteria.
publicSummary: Substance/Medication-Induced Depressive Disorder is a mental health condition classified in the DSM-5 under Depressive Disorders. This content provides educational information based on current clinical guidelines and is not a substitute for professional medical advice.
